answers.text:
Here's a link which provides some more information on this journal!

answers.author: Paul Shew
answers.text:
Hello Ian,
While I cannot help you with an analysis of, The Journal of Town and City Management, it is good to see your exploration of a wider range in academic literature.  PAR has also made efforts to connect with the practice, and is soliciting articles on the same. Your work will result in a better set of options for your community.
Keep up the research!

answers.author: Frances Adams-O'Brien
answers.text:
Ian, 
I am also looking for comments on this new publication. From what I can tell it seems to have an international audience. That's all I have for now. It may be some time before anyone has any review to offer. I hope we hear something. Thanks for asking!

author: Ian Coyle

title: Journal of Town and City Management
